fi.grimripper.loww.templates

Interface MovementTemplate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ObstacleTemplate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FourSquareTemplate, HexAndNeighborsTemplate, HorizontalTwoTileTemplate, SingleTileTemplate, SquareAndNeighborsTemplate

    public interface MovementTemplate
extends ObstacleTemplate
    A template for mobile objects. Since mobile objects are also obstacles, it extends ObstacleTemplate. This interface adds methods to query the template's dimensions, as well as a method to determine entered tiles when the template's host moves.
    Author:
    Marko Tuominen

        template's center point in the specified position

      • getMoveIndices

        int[] getMoveIndices(Direction to)
        Gets indices of entered tiles when a mobile object moves. After a step, the tiles in the given indices are ones that were not included in the template before the step. This method assumes that the mobile object is moving to the direction it's facing, so asymmetric templates don't have extra requirements.
        Parameters:
        to - step direction
        Returns:
        indices for new tiles
